actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to provide for Federal primary elections and for inclusion of not more than two national advisory referendum questions on the ballot in each biennial general election.

summary.text: Specifies a biennial date for Federal primary elections, and authorizes the Congress to include two national advisory referendum questions on the ballot in each biennial general election.

titles.title: A bill to provide for Federal primary elections and for inclusion of not more than two national advisory referendum questions on the ballot in each biennial general election.
